name: Chopper
description: Chop and gather wood from the forest. Humans don't notice.

name: Shine Bandit
description: Sneak into the human village and steal shiny metals. Be careful - too many of these and humans may notice!

name: Catcher
description: Catch critters scurrying around the forest. Humans don't notice.

name: Snacker
description: Find and take little snacks from the humans. They have so many you would think they wouldn't notice, but be careful - too much of this and they might

name: Watcher
description: Observe the humans and take notes. We can learn things from their weird behaviours. Why does the toilet seat need to be down anyway?!
